thread.section_title: Things Engraved Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Things Engraved Inc. | thingsengraved.ca
thread.title: Patty
thread.title_full: Things Engraved Inc. reviewed by Patty

author: Patty
title: Patty
text: I was very pleased with the jewellery box I purchased on line. If there was one thing I would have liked it would be to see a picture of it when it had the engraving on it. It was a gift and the recipient said it was really nice when she received it. The tracking was really good and I could see where the parcel was as it made it's way to it's destination. Very pleased with the overall experience.
